meanings.definition: Quietists: Those who practice or advocate quietism.
meanings.sent1: The quietists in the monastery spent their days in silent meditation.
meanings.sent2: The quietists believed in the power of inner peace to bring clarity.
meanings.sent3: The quietists decided to have a silent dance party, which was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her mind became a tranquil lake, mirroring the teachings of the quietists.
meanings.sent5: The quietists' philosophy was like a gentle breeze, calming the chaos within.
